column1: # webanno.custom.Participants | Participant # webanno.custom.Events | Event | Events # webanno.custom.Corefchains | Coref | AttachTo=webanno.custom.Participants
#id=1
#text=I often use the public bus system locally to get around town , as it is much cheaper than driving .
#id=2
#text=Before I leave home , I always make sure that I have enough money to pay for riding the bus wherever I need to go that day and back home .
#id=3
#text=This is especially important if I am going to be buying anything else that day .
#id=4
#text=Some bus systems have a special price for certain groups , like students .
#id=5
#text=I am able to use my student ID card to get a discounted rate .
#id=6
#text=I have a bus schedule at home where I can easily check it , but I have it memorized because I use it so much .
#id=7
#text=I make sure I leave to go to the bus stop so that I get there about five minutes early .
#id=8
#text=Usually the bus is on time , as long as there have n't been any issues that day .
#id=9
#text=When the bus arrives , I first check that it is the bus number for where I want to go , as different bus lines go to different areas of the city .
#text=When I get on the bus , I have to show my ID and pay , and then I can go to a seat .
#text=Sometimes the bus can be pretty full , and I have to sit next to someone else .
#text=A lot of the same people will often ride the bus with me , so I get to know them .
#text=I will sometimes bring a book with me to read while I ride the bus .
#text=I make sure to pay attention to what stop we are at , and start to prepare one stop ahead of where I need to get off the bus .
#text=Once I arrive at my bus stop , I walk to the front of the bus and thank the driver , then hop off and continue with whatever I need to do that day .
